attributes.action: Immediate and widespread testing available nationwide for Covid19
attributes.additional_details:
Only a swift and comprehensive reaction to a pandemic crisis as laid out with clarity by WHO is appropriate.
Testing is a vital component and knowledge base missing in the government strategy. 
People having knowledge of their status will support responsible actions and: slow spread of infection; reduce stretch on critical services; reduce number of long term health complications in survivors E.g scarred lungs which could increased susceptible to air pollution and other respiratory challenges.
attributes.background: Immediate and transparent widespread testing for infection and antibodies in ‘drive thru’ community hubs. Combined with a rigorous two degree contact tracing and targeted area lockdowns to halt spread. This will reduce the incubators if the virus and create time for research and imminent vaccine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
